Serpentor/Pyro:



Serpentor sidestepped, a blast digging into his right thigh.  He 
replaced his plasma rifle with a plasma launcher, not happy.

---

Pyro stumbled back as blasts collided with has abdomen.  Gripping the 
injured space with his free hand, he fired off two fire balls from 
his flame cannon at Shadow Wing.
